headline: With Iowa Less Crowded, Buttigieg Barnstorms
abstract: With three of his top rivals pinned down at the Senate impeachment trial, Mr. Buttigieg has seized the opportunity to camp out in the state, largely below the radar.
lead_paragraph: BURLINGTON, Iowa â€” With less than two weeks to go, Pete Buttigieg has a strategy to make up lost ground before the Iowa caucuses, one with echoes of the last Democratic president who carried the state by campaigning everywhere with a promise to mend divisions.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
